metadata.dc:author: Esquivias López-Cuervo, J
Conde García, J
Fernández-Nogueras, F J
metadata.dc:description: Epithelioid granuloma is not the typical antitumors reaction of the lymph nodes in head and neck area. In this study the authors look at and consider this subject in relation with tumors in the larynx.
metadata.dc:title: Linfadenitis granulomatosa en el cáncer de laringe.
[Granulomatous lymphadenitis in cancer of the larynx].
